com.jg.db.xml
Class JGDBXMLQueryManager

java.lang.Object
  com.jg.db.xml.JGDBXMLQueryManager

public class JGDBXMLQueryManager
extends java.lang.Object

XML로 해석하여 JGDBXMLQuery를 메모리에 적재,관리합니다.

Author:
Hyeong yeon. Kim. kimbobv22@gmail.com
